revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SMC |model=SMC2552W |revision=-G2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/22/2006 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Accton |manuf_model=WA4101X |manuf_rev=-2-FLF-17 |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=HEDSMC2552WG2 |ic_id=3857A-2552WG2 |pwr_v=5.1 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT48LC8M32B2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, DE-9,, |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=SMC |default_ssid_regex=^SMC$ |default_ip=192.168.2.2 |default_user=admin |default_pass=smcadmin |oui=00:13:F7 |oui_eth=00:13:F7 }} {{TagLine|Eliteconnect 2.4GHz Wireless Access Point}} :[http://www.smc.com/index.cfm?event=viewProduct&cid=94&scid=99&localeCode=EN_USA&pid=1563 Product page]
"P/N: 141610220007E R01" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Possible 00:13:F7 OUI (on FCC EUT MAC label) {{see also|Accton|Arcadyan}} Default settings are per the FCC manual.
